data.eml:eml: Aphelochaeta (Polychaeta: Cirratulidae) from the Pacific coast of Costa Rica, with a description of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dean, Harlan K., Blake, James A. (2016): Aphelochaeta (Polychaeta: Cirratulidae) from the Pacific coast of Costa Rica, with a description of five new species. Zootaxa 4103 (2): 101-116, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4103.2.1
